titleStmt.title: The publique worship, or, The worship of God baptisme and sacrament (so called) according to Gods appointment, or as hereafter appeareth : and concerning coming to the church according to Scripture ... / written in year 1664, by R.F.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
